experience.title: Monetization Analyst
experience.description: Scaled up e-commerce ad monetization function from scratch in KSA, Egypt, Qatar, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Pakistan, Kenya, Lebanon, and Jordan to develop a 7 Mn AED recurring revenue stream in a 2 member team- Strategy & Planning: Conceived and implemented go-to-market strategy for monetization in 10 countries through identification and implementation of new channels, competitive benchmarking, pricing of inventories, streamlining workflow, forging partnerships & developing centralized campaign directives- Key Account Management: Cultivated strong relationships with brands and media agencies across countries to maximize revenue. Developed mechanism for streamlining lead generation and lead management - Analytics:  Responsible for end-to-end campaign reporting and delivering critical insights to the brands, suppliers and internal stakeholders. Conceptualized forecasting models and trackers for ad monetization.- Campaign Management: Managed ad trafficking through Google Ad Manager. Co-ordinated with all internal stakeholders such as Onsite Marketing, CRM, Performance Marketing and Analytics to optimally execute campaigns
experience.description_html: Scaled up e-commerce ad monetization function from scratch in KSA, Egypt, Qatar, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Pakistan, Kenya, Lebanon, and Jordan to develop a 7 Mn AED recurring revenue stream in a 2 member team- Strategy & Planning: Conceived and implemented go-to-market strategy for monetization in 10 countries through identification and implementation of new channels, competitive benchmarking, pricing of inventories, streamlining workflow, forging partnerships & developing centralized campaign directives- Key Account Management: Cultivated strong relationships with brands and media agencies across countries to maximize revenue. Developed mechanism for streamlining lead generation and lead management - Analytics: Responsible for end-to-end campaign reporting and delivering critical insights to the brands, suppliers and internal stakeholders. Conceptualized forecasting models and trackers for ad monetization.- Campaign Management: Managed ad trafficking through Google Ad Manager. Co-ordinated with all internal stakeholders such as Onsite Marketing, CRM, Performance Marketing and Analytics to optimally execute campaigns

experience.title: Strategy Consultant
experience.location: Dubai Internet City, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: For a leading real estate company in Dubai-Strategy: Developed comprehensive Digital Marketing Transformation strategy covering value proposition, content, channels, organization and processes, data, infrastructure and performance measurement-Performance management: Recommended 15 data use cases to improve strategic levers such as lead sourcing, lead servicing and sales efficiency to drive three fold revenue growth from digital sources in next 3 yearsFor a global electronics giant-Strategy: Formulated a segmentation strategy for the launch of a leading flagship smartphone based on device ownership, passion points, and interaction with the campaign-PMO: Coordinated activities of media agency, creative agency, and technology providers to ensure effortless execution of digital marketing campaigns; streamlined campaign reporting process

experience.title: Summer Associate
experience.description: Interned with Buddha Fellowship Program in a rural empowerment role, travelling across 5 Indian states. Work included:-Collaborating with media and branding agency to proactively design detailed marketing mix for fruit juices-Formulating new product development strategy and conceptualizing 3 new fruit juice variants for the brand-Leading BTL promotion campaign to conduct sampling and telemarketing of premium juices in Delhi-Ensuring seamless procurement by leading negotiations with 10+ vendors from 5 states & 4 countries-Devising product and technology roadmap to secure funding from a central government agency (TDB, GoI)
experience.description_html: Interned with Buddha Fellowship Program in a rural empowerment role, travelling across 5 Indian states. Work included:-Collaborating with media and branding agency to proactively design detailed marketing mix for fruit juices-Formulating new product development strategy and conceptualizing 3 new fruit juice variants for the brand-Leading BTL promotion campaign to conduct sampling and telemarketing of premium juices in Delhi-Ensuring seamless procurement by leading negotiations with 10+ vendors from 5 states & 4 countries-Devising product and technology roadmap to secure funding from a central government agency (TDB, GoI)

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Technical Intern in QA and R&D Department at Parle HQ, work included;•	Development of Low Calorie Cookie formulation with no added sugar and 20% less fat content.•	Conducting 15+ chemical tests daily across 5 categories of products to check quality compliance •	Bench-marking 250+ competitor and supplier packaging samples across categories•	Preparing physical parameter testing reports for 500+domestic and international product samples

experience.title: Summer Trainee
